## Call.Score enum

An enumeration of all scores that could be used to rate the experience of a call or issues encountered during the call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enum Score 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Five | <code>5</code> | An issue had severity approximately 5/5. |
|  Four | <code>4</code> | An issue had severity approximately 4/5. |
|  NotReported | <code>0</code> | An issue was not encountered or there is no desire to report said issue. |
|  One | <code>1</code> | An issue had severity approximately 1/5. |
|  Three | <code>3</code> | An issue had severity approximately 3/5. |
|  Two | <code>2</code> | An issue had severity approximately 2/5. |
